title: [Question] Got T.T for ise I am from ECE 3rd sem wanted to ask if CIE exam is compulsory and if compulsory then it's online or offline
content: Got T.T for ise I am from ECE 3rd sem wanted to ask if CIE exam is compulsory and if compulsory then it's online or offline
